parameter.value: Greetings, traveller |PLAYERNAME|. As you have found the way to my hut, how can I help you?
Here. Don't forget, if you buy potions, there's a deposit of 5 gold on the empty flask.
I'm a druid and healer, a follower of Crunor.
There are only two other druids on Rookgaard, Lily and Cipfried.
May Crunor bless you and protect you on your journeys!
She's a druid. Since she started selling life fluids, people visit me only rarely. Which is a good thing, but of course I'll help if I'm needed.
I'll pay you 5 gold for every empty vial.
